data.title: Football Club History Database
data.text:
BIRMINGHAM CITY

1945 Birmingham changed name 1945-46 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1947-48 Football League Division Two Champions Promoted to Division One 1950-51 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1951-52 Missed promotion to Division One on goal average 1954-55 Football League Division Two Champions (on goal difference x2) Promoted to Division One 1955-56 F.A. Cup runner-up 1956-57 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1955-58 European Inter Cities Fairs Cup Semi-finalists 1958-60 European Inter Cities Fairs Cup runner-up 1960-61 European Inter Cities Fairs Cup runner-up 1962-63 Football League Cup Winners 1965 Relegated to Division Two 1966-67 Football League Cup semi-finalists 1967-68 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1971-72 Football League Division Two runner-up Promoted to Division One F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1974-75 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1979 Relegated to Division Two 1979-80 Promoted to Division One (on goal difference) 1984 Relegated to Division Two 1984-85 Football League Division Two runner-up Promoted to Division One 1986 Relegated to Division Two 1989 Relegated to Division Three 1991-92 Football League Division Three runner-up Promoted to Division Two 1992-93 Division Two re-designated Division One on formation of F.A. Premier League 1994 Relegated to Division Two (on goals scored) 1994-95 Football League Division Two Champions Promoted to Division One Football League Cup semi-finalists 1998-99 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Watford 1 Birmingham City 0, Birmingham City 1 Watford 0, Agg 1-1, Watford won 7-6 on penalties) 1999-00 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Birmingham City 0 Barnsley 4, Barnsley 1 Birmingham City 2, Agg 2-5) 2000-01 Football League Cup runner-up Not promoted after play-offs (SF Birmingham City 1 Preston North End 0, Preston North End 2 Birmingham City 1 - Agg 4-4 Preston North End won 4-2 on penalties) 2001-02 Promoted to F.A. Premier League after play-offs (SF Birmingham City 1 Millwall 1, Millwall 0 Birmingham City 1 - Agg 2-1, F Birmingham City 1 Norwich City 1, Birmingham won 4-2 on penalties @ Millennium Stadium, Cardiff) 2006 Relegated to Football League Championship 2006-07 Football League runner-up Promoted to F.A. Premier League 2008 Relegated to Football League Championship 2008-09 Football League runner-up Promoted to F.A. Premier League 2010-11 Football League Cup winners (2nd time) 2011 Relegated to Football League Championship 2011-12 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Blackpool 1 Birmingham City 0, Birmingham City 2 Blackpool 2 - Agg 2-3 F West Ham United 2 Birmingham City 1 @ Wembley Stadium) 2016-17 Football League renamed English Football League 2018-19 Nine points deducted 2024 Relegated to League One SEASON
